content: travelling cables cowl knitting pattern skills required cast on the knit stitch the purl stitch knitting in the round cabling and cast off very pink knits not affiliated have excellent video tutorials covering the skills required for this pattern https //verypink com/ finished size 49cm around x 25cm high materials required 4mm and 5mm 50cm circular needles or sizes needed to obtain gauge 175-225m aran yarn stitch marker cable needle darning needle to sew in ends notes this pattern is written in a line by line format sorry no chart i used the cable cast on but any cast on with some stretch works standard cast off with larger needles is better than a very stretchy bind off pattern repeat is 10 stitches and 24 row gauge 16 stitches x 23 row = 10cm slight variations in the gauge will not matter too much i used several different yarns each with a different gauge and the cowls all came out about the same size some were slightly taller but all were within 1cm of being the same size around abbreviations k knit p purl c4f slip the next 2 stitches to the cable needle and hold at front of the work k2 then k2 from cable needle c4b slip the next 2 stitches to the cable needle and hold at back of the work k2 then k2 from cable needle cr3f slip next 2 stitches to cable needle and hold in front of work p1 then k2 from cable needle cr3b slip next stitch to cable needle and hold at back of work k2 then p1 from cable needle pm place marker rm remove marker pattern with smaller needles cast on 120 stitches place marker and join in round taking care not to twist the stitches ribbing k1 p2 k2 repeat to last 3 stitches p2 k1 repeat last row 9 more times change to larger needles foundation row 1 purl foundation row 2 p3 k4 p6 repeat to last 7 stitches k4 p3 cable section rounds 1 & 2 p3 k4 p6 repeat to last 7 stitches k4 p3 round 3 p3 c4b p6 repeat to last 7 stitches c4b p3 round 4 p3 k4 p6 repeat to last 7 stitches k4 p3 round 5 p2 cr3b cr3f p4 repeat to last 8 stitches cr3b cr3f p2 round 6 p2 k2 p2 k2 p4 repeat to last 8 stitches k2 p2 2 round 7 p1 cr3b p2 cr3f p2 repeat to last 9 stitches cr3b p2 cr3f p1 round 8 p1 k2 p4 k2 p2 repeat to last 9 stitches k2 p4 k2 p1 round 9 cr3b p4 cr3f repeat to end of round round 10 k2 p6 k4 p6 repeat to last 2 stitches k2 rm slip last 2 stitches back to left needle pm round 11 c4b p6 repeat to end of round rounds 12-14 k4 p6 repeat to end of round round 15 c4b p6 repeat to end of round round 16 k4 p6 repeat to
